text: But when I saw that they were not walking uprightly in accordance with the truth of the gospel, I said to 2:14 Peter 91.7% ¦ Cephas CT 4.8%Peter in front of them all, “If yoʋ, though a Jew, live like a Gentile and not like a Jew, 2:14 why do ¦ how is it that CTwhy do yoʋ compel the Gentiles to live like Jews?”
